#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int digsum(int i)
{
  int sum=0;
  	while(i>0)
	{
		sum+=i%10;
		i/=10;
	}
	return sum;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int ques;
		cin>>ques;
		bool flag=false;
		for(int i=0;i<ques;i++)
		{
			if(digsum(i)+i==ques)
			{
				flag=true;
				cout<<i<<endl;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(flag==false)cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
